title: Charities Act 2009 (No. 6 of 2009), the Charities (Transfer of Departmental
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Charities Act 2009 (Section 33)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Charities Act 2009 (Section 33) 

(Relevant Regulator) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited charity act 2009 (section 33) (relevant regulator) order 2022

title: Charities Act 2009 (No. 6 of 2009), the Charities (Transfer of Departmental
heading: 2. The following body and office holder are prescribed for the purposes of
text_raw:
2. The following body and office holder are prescribed for the purposes of 
paragraph (a) of the definition of “relevant regulator” in section 33(6) of the 
Charities Act 2009 (No. 6 of 2009): 

(a) Approved Housing Bodies Regulatory Authority; 

(b) Registrar of Companies. 

GIVEN under my hand, 
 8 June 2022 

JOE O'BRIEN, 
 Minister of State at the Department of Rural and Community 

Development. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 10th June, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [276] 3
